title: MassID NFT IPFS Record
description: Complete MassID NFT IPFS record including fixed attributes and detailed waste tracking data

$schema.title: JSON Schema URI
$schema.description: URI of the JSON Schema used to validate this record

hash.title: Schema Hash
hash.description: Keccak256 hash of the JSON Schema this record was validated against

version.title: Schema Version
version.description: Version of the schema, using semantic versioning

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: ISO 8601 creation timestamp for this record

external_id.title: External ID
external_id.description: Off-chain reference ID (UUID from Carrot backend)

original_content_hash.title: Original Content Hash
original_content_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the original JSON content including private data before schema validation

content_hash.title: Content Hash
content_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of RFC 8785 canonicalized JSON after schema validation

name.title: Creator Name
name.description: Company or individual name that created this record

relationships.title: Relationships
relationships.description: References to other IPFS records this record relates to

target_uri.title: Target IPFS URI
target_uri.description: Target IPFS URI of the referenced record

type.title: Relationship Type
type.description: Type of relationship to the referenced record

description.title: Relationship Description
examples: This record supersedes the previous version
Child record derived from this parent

deployment.title: Deployment Environment
deployment.description: System environment where this record was generated

data_set_name.title: Data Set Name
data_set_name.description: Name of the data set for this record

data.title: MassID Data
data.description: MassID-specific data containing waste tracking and chain of custody information

waste_properties.title: Waste Properties
waste_properties.description: Standardized waste material properties and regulatory information

local_classification.title: Local Classification
local_classification.description: Local or regional waste classification codes and descriptions

system.title: Classification System
system.description: Classification system name - currently supports IBAMA (Instituto Brasileiro do Meio Ambiente e dos Recursos Naturais Renováveis)

measurement_unit.title: Measurement Unit
measurement_unit.description: Unit of measurement for the waste quantity

net_weight.title: Net Weight
net_weight.description: Net weight of the waste batch in the specified measurement unit

contamination_level.title: Contamination Level
contamination_level.description: Level of contamination in the waste batch

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: All locations referenced in this MassID, indexed by ID

items.title: Location
items.description: Geographic location with address and coordinate information

responsible_participant_id_hash.title: Responsible Participant ID Hash
responsible_participant_id_hash.description: Anonymized ID of the participant responsible for this location

facility_type.title: Facility Type
facility_type.description: Type of facility at this location

participants.title: Participants
participants.description: All participants referenced in this MassID, indexed by ID

items.title: Participant
items.description: A participant in the waste management supply chain

roles.title: Participant Roles
roles.description: Roles of the participant in the waste management supply chain

items.title: Participant Role
items.description: Role that a participant plays in the waste management supply chain

chain_of_custody.title: Chain of Custody
chain_of_custody.description: Complete chain of custody tracking from waste generation to final processing

events.title: Custody Events
events.description: Chronological sequence of custody transfer and processing events

event_name.title: Event Name
event_name.description: Name of custody or processing event

description.title: Event Description
description.description: Detailed description of what happened during this event
examples: Waste collected from residential area using collection truck
Material sorted into recyclable and non-recyclable fractions
Plastic waste processed through shredding and washing
Waste transferred to authorized recycling facility
Final disposal at licensed landfill site
Quality inspection and contamination assessment completed

timestamp.title: Event Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

participant_id_hash.title: Participant ID Hash
participant_id_hash.description: Reference to participant in the participants array

location_id_hash.title: Location ID Hash
location_id_hash.description: Reference to location in the locations array

attributes.title: Event Attributes
attributes.description: Additional attributes specific to this event

items.title: Event Attribute
items.description: Additional attribute specific to an event

preserved_sensitivity.title: Preserved Sensitivity
preserved_sensitivity.description: Indicates if the attribute contains sensitive information that was preserved

format.title: Event Attribute Format
format.description: Data format hint for proper display

reference.title: Document Reference
reference.description: Reference to document (IPFS hash, file name, or external URL)

notes.title: Event Notes
notes.description: Additional notes or comments about this event

total_distance_km.title: Total Distance (km)
total_distance_km.description: Total distance traveled across all transport events

total_duration_hours.title: Total Duration (hours)
total_duration_hours.description: Total time from first to last event in hours

geographic_data.title: Geographic Data
geographic_data.description: Geographic information about waste origin and processing locations

origin_location_id_hash.title: Origin Location ID Hash
origin_location_id_hash.description: Reference to origin location in the locations array

processing_location_id_hashes.title: Processing Location ID Hashes
processing_location_id_hashes.description: Locations where the waste was processed or handled

items.title: SHA256 Hash
items.description: SHA-256 cryptographic hash as hexadecimal string

final_destination_id_hash.title: Final Destination ID Hash
final_destination_id_hash.description: Reference to final destination in the locations array

from_location_id_hash.title: From Location ID Hash
from_location_id_hash.description: Reference to the origin location in the locations array

to_location_id_hash.title: To Location ID Hash
to_location_id_hash.description: Reference to the destination location in the locations array

distance_km.title: Distance (km)
distance_km.description: Distance for this route segment in kilometers

transport_method.title: Transport Method
transport_method.description: Method of transportation for this segment

duration_hours.title: Duration (hours)
duration_hours.description: Time taken for this route segment in hours

smart_contract_address.title: Smart Contract Address
smart_contract_address.description: A valid Ethereum address in hexadecimal format

name.title: NFT Name
name.description: Full display name for this NFT, including extra context

short_name.title: Short Name
short_name.description: Compact name for UI summaries, tables, or tooltips

description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable summary of the NFT's role and context. Ideally, maximum 300 characters.
examples: This MassID represents 3 metric tons of organic food waste from Enlatados Produção, tracked through complete chain of custody from generation to composting.
This RecycledID represents 2.5 metric tons of recycled plastic bottles processed by Green Solutions Ltd.

image.title: Image URI
image.description: IPFS URI pointing to the preview image

background_color.title: Background Color
background_color.description: Hex color code for marketplace background display

animation_url.title: Animation URL
animation_url.description: IPFS URI pointing to an animated or interactive media file

external_links.title: External Links
external_links.description: Optional list of public resource links with labels

examples.label: Carrot Explorer
examples.description: Complete chain of custody and audit trail

examples.label: Carrot White Paper
examples.description: Carrot Foundation technical and impact white paper

items.title: External Link
items.description: External link with label and description

label.title: Link Label
label.description: Display name for the external link

url.title: Link URL
url.description: Direct URI to the linked resource

description.title: Link Description
description.description: Optional context about what the link provides

value.title: Waste Type
value.description: Category or type of waste material

value.title: Waste Subtype
value.description: Specific subcategory of waste within a waste type

value.title: Origin Country Value
value.description: Country where the waste was generated

value.title: Origin Municipality Value
value.description: Municipality where the waste was generated

value.title: Origin Division Value
value.description: Administrative division (state/province) where the waste was generated

value.title: Integrator Value
value.description: Organization that integrated the waste into the Carrot network

prefixItems.title: Pick-up Date Attribute
prefixItems.description: Pick-up date attribute with Unix timestamp

value.title: Pick-up Date Value
value.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds when the waste was picked up from the source

value.title: Recycling Date Value
value.description: Date when the waste was recycled/processed
